name: Suburbia (Some Guy)
description:
Suburbia was made for the 2022 Biannual MoonJam 1
The theme was : A Facade

John has just got a brand new job in suburbia, follow him as he checks out his new house.

Controls

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Known Bug - When given your objective, doing the action twice will soft lock the game (sorry)
